title: Red (Strongman): Romance Novella
description: Ladies and Gentleman, welcome to the show! Our entertainers invite you to gaze upon their oddity and expertise. We never stop working on our arts, never stop searching for the bizarre, and never give up on amazing and delighting crowds with the most death defying stunts and unique sights. Come one, come all, to The Roy G. Biv Freak Show! Shy and conservative Gabriella Davis, finds it a little difficult to fit in at the Roy G. Biv Freak Show, even though she loves her new job as Roy’s personal assistant. She can’t help but notice, Arrick, the freak show’s hulking Viking, and the strongman definitely has his eye on Ms. Davis. When the immigration office sends a letter, Arrick learns he can only stay in the country legally for a few more weeks. Gabriella, in an uncharacteristic move, volunteers to marry him, so that he can stay with the only family and home he’s ever known. Can what is supposed to be a Green Card marriage turn into something more? Warning! This book contains erotic content not suitable for readers under the age of 18. It may also include strong language and other adult themes not meant for a younger audience. Look for ORANGE coming soon!
author: Layne A. Carver
